roleset.name: cause injury
roleset.note: INFLICT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inflict' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no comparison. (from inflict.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: unmentioned injured
example.text: That should help IBM address the damage that a resurgent Storage Technology Corp. has inflicted in that market.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: There are no winners or losers until now , and both sides are announcing the casualties they inflicted on the enemy front .
